issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Use env var for location of arrow test data
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5053](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5053). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A small number of tests have hard coded relative path for arrow test data files, meaning that the tests fail in the release tarball.

We should use an ARROW_TEST_DATA env var similar to how we deal with PARQUET_TEST_DATA
